channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Crumbling surround to manhole cover, 27th March
item.description:
The problem cover is actually on the pavement. The damaged tarmac around the cover represents a significant trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Quat Goose Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 27th March
item.description:
28 day with give an take please relay x1 sunken kerb 450x150x30mm stats required please number 1 (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
